resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/104932</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>104932</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770202716</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The Life and Works of Edgar Allan Poe</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Lebensdauer und die Arbeiten von Edgar Allan 
Poe</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La vie et les travaux d'Edgar Allan Poe</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A vida e os trabalhos de Edgar Allan Poe</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La durata e gli impianti di Edgar Allan Poe</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η ζωή και οι εργασίες του Edgar Allan Poe</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La vida y los trabajos de Edgar Allan Poe</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Students will evaluate a sampling of literary selections by Edgar Allan Poe and assess the influence of Poe's life on his works.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kursteilnehmer werten ein Musterstück der 
literarischen Anwählungen durch Edgar Allan Poe aus und den Einfluß 
von Leben Poes auf seins festzusetzen arbeitet.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les étudiants évalueront un prélèvement des 
sélections littéraires par Edgar Allan Poe et évaluer l'influence 
de la vie de Poe sur le sien fonctionne.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os estudantes avaliarão uma amostragem de 
seleções literárias por Edgar Allan Poe e avaliar a influência da 
vida de Poe em his trabalha.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gli allievi valuteranno un campione delle 
selezioni letterarie da Edgar Allan Poe e valutare l'influenza di vita
del Poe su suo funziona.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι σπουδαστές θα αξιολογήσουν μια δειγματοληψία των 
λογοτεχνικών επιλογών από τον Edgar Allan Poe και θα 
αξιολογήσουν την επιρροή της ζωής του σημείου εισόδου στις 
εργασίες του.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los estudiantes evaluarán un muestreo de 
selecciones literarias de Edgar Allan Poe y evaluar la influencia de 
la vida de Poe en el suyo trabaja.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:PEGGY STANLEY
FN:PEGGY STANLEY
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770202716</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>104932</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/the-life-and-works-of-edgar-allan-poe</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
